binding:binding.name: DSMR Binding
binding:binding.description:
General information

This binding makes data from the Dutch Smart Meter available to openHAB2.

There following DSMR-meter versions (V2 - V5) are supported:

  • Electricity (DSMR V2 t/m V5)
  • Gas (DSMR V2 t/m V5)
  • Heating (DSMR V2 t/m V5)
  • Cooloing (DSMR V2 t/m V5)
  • Water (DSMR V2 t/m V5)
  • Generic (DSMR V3)
  • Slave Electricity (DSMR V4 t/m V5)
Depending on the device model specific values will be available.

The data from the Smart Meter is available from the P1-port (inverted TTL on a RJ-11 connector). Dedicated cables are available (Search for 'Slimme Meter P1' or 'USB-RJ11').

Installation & configuration

After installing the binding you always need to a 'Dutch Smart Meter' thing manually. This thing needs to be configured and has the following parameters:

  • Serial Port name (mandatory)
  • Serial Port parameters (optional). This can be used in case autodetection port speed fails.
  • Lenient mode (optional). In case of frequent communication loss or CRC-validation problems this mode can be activated to less the binding act less strict.

Thing discovery

The binding will autodiscover a 'Thing' for each available meter. For the newer meters (DSMR V4 and up) the binding can not autodiscover the type of each meter (it can not distuinguish a water meter from a gas meter and not a cooling meter from a heating meter).
This information is not needed for the binding to work so therefor you only have to clarify this in labels and descriptions of Things and Items.

Meter (re-)placement

There following scenario's are identified during usage of the binding: - Initial placement of a DSMR-meter while binding is already running. No special action is needed only set up the correct serial port. - Initial placement of additional meters (gas, water, etc.) to the already installed DSMR-meer. No special action is needed. The new meters will be autodetected. - Replacement of additional meters (gas, water, etc.). The new meter will be autodetected. You have to remove the old Thing manually. - Replacement of DSMR-meter (with or without additional meters). Important. You have to remove all DSMR-related Things to ensure correct working. - Removal of DSMR-meter and/or additional meters. Remove the corresponding Things.
